医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
内分泌学会发布关于维生素 D 使用和测试的新临床实践指南根据今天发布的新的临床实践指南，75 岁以下的健康成年人不太可能从超过医学研究所 (IOM) 建议的每日维生素 D 摄入量中获益，并且不需要检测维生素 D 水平。内分泌学会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Endocrine-Society-issues-new-clinical-practice-guideline-on-vitamin-D-use-and-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Endocrine-Society-issues-new-clinical-practice-guideline-on-vitamin-D-use-and-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aed9cd46-842a-414c-a76a-a41430794f41 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 15:37:09 -0400 Endocrine Society issues new clinical practice guideline on vitamin D use and testing
孕前减肥手术类型可能会影响孩子的早期体重增加周一在马萨诸塞州波士顿举行的内分泌学会年会 ENDO 2024 上发表的一项研究表明，女性在怀孕前接受的减肥手术类型可能会影响她们的孩子在生命前三年的体重增加量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Pre-pregnancy-weight-loss-surgery-type-may-affect-childs-early-weight-gain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Pre-pregnancy-weight-loss-surgery-type-may-affect-childs-early-weight-gain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1075690d-a0c5-4a63-9e5a-ace11aabc1e4 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 15:33:17 -0400 Pre-pregnancy weight loss surgery type may affect child's early weight gain
远程医疗促进糖尿病和心脏病患者公平地获得内分泌护理周一在马萨诸塞州波士顿举行的内分泌学会年会 ENDO 2024 上公布的一项研究显示，大流行期间远程医疗的广泛普及使 2 型糖尿病和心脏病患者能够更公平地获得内分泌护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Telemedicine-boosts-equitable-access-to-endocrinology-care-for-病人-with-diabetes-and-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Telemedicine-boosts-equitable-access-to-endocrinology-care-for-病人-with-diabetes-and-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74c5662e-6988-4bcb-9d3e-4f5a6075ba97 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 15:28:27 -0400 Telemedicine boosts equitable access to endocrinology care for patients with diabetes and heart disease
头带冥想可以缓解库欣手术后的疼痛并改善功能周一在内分泌学会年度会议 ENDO 2024 上发表的一项研究表明，与未使用该设备的患者相比，正在从手术中恢复的库欣综合征患者在冥想时佩戴可追踪大脑活动的头带可能会减轻疼痛并改善身体机能。在马萨诸塞州波士顿举行会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Headband-meditation-may-offer-pain-relief-and-improved-function-after-Cushings-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Headband-meditation-may-offer-pain-relief-and-improved-function-after-Cushings-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=714ea79a-155d-47ba-9d4e-a3d2d608e0a2 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 15:24:08 -0400 Headband meditation may offer pain relief and improved function after Cushing's surgery
睡眠呼吸暂停与老年人住院率较高有关即将在 SLEEP 2024 年会上公布的一项新研究发现，睡眠呼吸暂停与老年人未来使用医疗保健服务（包括住院治疗）的几率增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Sleep-apnea-linked-to-higher-hospitalization-rates-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Sleep-apnea-linked-to-higher-hospitalization-rates-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70488385-3cb5-4b88-bc52-8d9d3ffb1c75 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 15:14:16 -0400 Sleep apnea linked to higher hospitalization rates in older adults
小剂量阿司匹林可以减少睡眠限制引起的炎症反应即将在 SLEEP 2024 年会上发表的一项新研究发现，低剂量乙酰水杨酸（也称为阿司匹林）可以减少睡眠限制引起的炎症反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Low-dose-aspirin-can-reduce-profit-responses-to-sleep-restriction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Low-dose-aspirin-can-reduce-炎症-responses-to-sleep-restriction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f02069b-0621-4646-8f24-9bf9cfea73ba Mon, 03 Jun 2024 15:11:05 -0400 Low-dose aspirin can reduce inflammatory responses to sleep restriction
研究人员展示了社会经济地位和遗传学对疾病风险的相互作用众所周知，社会经济地位（SES）的差异与患病风险的差异有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Researchers-show-the-interplay-of-socioeconomic-status-and-genics-on-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Researchers-show-the-interplay-of-socioeconomic-status-and-genics-on-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54aae795-e224-421f-bcbc-c75a3890e02b Mon, 03 Jun 2024 15:07:58 -0400 Researchers show the interplay of socioeconomic status and genetics on disease risk
内分泌干​​扰物对低收入女性的伤害尤为严重一项新的研究发现，过去 20 年来，美国育龄妇女和孕妇，尤其是社会和经济地位较低的妇女，接触一些损害甲状腺的内分泌干扰化学物质 (EDC) 的情况有所增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Endocrine-disruptors-disproportionately-harm-low-venue-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Endocrine-disruptors-disproportionately-harm-low-venue-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec0625fb-dc1b-49bd-a3fc-eb3b7ff85eb3 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 15:02:55 -0400 Endocrine disruptors disproportionately harm low-income women
提前绝经可能会增加患乳腺癌和卵巢癌的风险根据周一在马萨诸塞州波士顿举行的内分泌学会年会 ENDO 2024 上发表的研究，一些过早（40 岁之前）经历更年期的女性患乳腺癌和卵巢癌的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Early-menopause-may-increase-risk-for-developing-breast-and-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Early-menopause-may-increase-risk-for-developing-breast-and-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25bcd8d5-5dd6-4673-8f38-e66d80a7d66b Mon, 03 Jun 2024 14:59:39 -0400 Early menopause may increase risk for developing breast and ovarian cancer
新型男性避孕凝胶比类似的避孕方法更快地抑制精子产生一项新的研究表明，一种新型男性避孕凝胶结合了醋酸赛孕酮（名为 Nestorone）和睾酮两种激素，比类似的基于激素的男性节育实验方法更快地抑制精子产生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Novel-male-contraceptive-gel-suppresses-sperm-product-faster-than-similar-birth-control-methods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Novel-male-contraceptive-gel-suppresses-sperm-product-faster-than-similar-birth-control-methods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7a806d4-b113-4638-942e-fb6a24bc46ff Mon, 03 Jun 2024 14:45:19 -0400 Novel male contraceptive gel suppresses sperm production faster than similar birth control methods
